privacy.headerSubtitle: Information according to Art. 13 and 14 GDPR
privacy.section2Content: We process personal data exclusively in accordance with the GDPR and Austrian data protection law. We deliberately refrain from data processing that is not necessary and focus on transparency, data minimization, and technical security.
privacy.section3Content1: Our website is hosted by Hetzner Online GmbH (Industriestr. 25, 91710 Gunzenhausen, Germany).
privacy.section3Content2: The servers are located exclusively within the European Union. A data processing agreement according to Art. 28 GDPR exists with the hosting provider.
privacy.section4Content1: When you visit our website, the following data is automatically collected by our hosting provider and stored for a maximum of 7 days:
privacy.section4ListItem1: IP address of the accessing device
privacy.section4ListItem2: Date and time of the server request
privacy.section4Content2: This data serves to ensure secure and stable server operation and to detect attacks. No merging with other data sources or profile creation takes place. After the storage period, the data is automatically deleted.
privacy.section4LegalBasis: Legal basis: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in the secure provision of the website)
privacy.section5Content1: If you contact us via a form (e.g., contact, feedback, or application), we process the data you submit (e.g., name, email, message, attachments if applicable) exclusively for the purpose of processing your request.
privacy.section5Content2: The data will not be passed on to third parties and will be processed exclusively internally. Application data will be deleted no later than 6 months after the conclusion of the selection process.
privacy.section5LegalBasis: Legal basis: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a (consent) and lit. b (pre-contractual measures)
privacy.section6Content1: We use the privacy-friendly analysis tool {umamiHighlight} in a self-hosted version. No cookies are set and no personal data is stored. Only anonymized usage data is collected:
privacy.section6Content2: This data is used exclusively for the technical improvement of our website. No data is passed on to third parties.
privacy.section6LegalBasis: Legal basis: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in reach analysis without profiling)
privacy.section7Content: Our website does not set cookies and does not use tracking services such as Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, or similar. External resources (e.g., fonts or icons) are also integrated locally only.
privacy.section8Content: Access to our website is exclusively encrypted via HTTPS (TLS). Our servers and services are regularly updated, monitored, and secured by appropriate technical and organizational measures (TOMs).
privacy.section8aTitle: 8a. IP Anonymization in the Captcha System
privacy.section8aContent1: To protect our contact form from automated attacks (e.g., spam or bots), we use a specially developed captcha system. The IP address of the requesting device is {notStoredHighlight}, but technically anonymized before processing.
privacy.section8aContent2: For this purpose, the IP address is anonymized with a one-way hashing method (SHA-256) and processed only in this non-traceable form temporarily in our security system. The data is stored exclusively for the technical detection of abusive multiple accesses and is automatically deleted after at most 10 minutes.
privacy.section8aLegalBasis: Legal basis: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in the security of our systems)
privacy.section9ListItem1: Information about your stored data (Art. 15 GDPR)
privacy.section10Content: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy if the legal situation or our offering changes. The latest version can always be found on this page.
